_ga.purpose: Google Analytics tracking cookie used to distinguish users and sessions
_ga.description: Stores a unique client identifier and tracks user interactions across the website

_gid.purpose: Google Analytics cookie used to distinguish users
_gid.description: Stores a unique user identifier for analytics tracking

_fbp.purpose: Facebook Pixel tracking cookie for advertising and analytics
_fbp.description: Used by Facebook to track users across websites for advertising purposes

sessionid.purpose: Maintains user session state across page requests
sessionid.description: Essential for website functionality, maintains user login state and preferences

authToken.purpose: Stores user authentication token for secure access
authToken.description: Essential for user authentication and secure access to account features

csrftoken.description: Security token that prevents malicious cross-site requests

ads_user.description: Used to identify users for personalized advertising campaigns

session-id.purpose: Unique session identifier for user tracking
session-id.description: Essential for maintaining user session and website functionality

session-id-time.purpose: Tracks session duration and timing information
session-id-time.description: Records when the session was created for analytics purposes

session-token.description: Secure token for user authentication and session management

csm-hit.description: Tracks content delivery and performance metrics

rxc.description: Advanced tracking cookie for real-time user behavior analysis

_gat.description: Used to throttle request rate to Google Analytics

_gcl_au.description: Used by Google Ads to store conversion tracking information

PHPSESSID.description: Essential PHP session cookie for website functionality

remember_token.purpose: Remember user login across browser sessions
remember_token.description: Allows users to stay logged in across browser sessions

cart_id.description: Essential for maintaining shopping cart contents

user_preferences.purpose: Stores user interface preferences and settings
user_preferences.description: Remembers user interface preferences like theme, language, etc.

tracking_pixel.purpose: Pixel tracking for analytics and advertising
tracking_pixel.description: Invisible tracking pixel for user behavior monitoring

affiliate_id.description: Tracks affiliate referrals and commission attribution

ab_test.description: Tracks which version of the site the user sees for testing

_hjSessionUser_.purpose: Hotjar user identifier for behavior analytics
_hjSessionUser_.description: Assigns a unique ID to a visitor to help Hotjar understand user behavior across sessions

_hjIncludedInSessionSample.description: Indicates if a user is included in data sampling for session analytics

li_gc.purpose: LinkedIn consent cookie for ad tracking
li_gc.description: Stores user consent for LinkedIn cookies used in advertising

bcookie.description: Used by LinkedIn to identify browsers for tracking and analytics purposes

lang.description: Used to remember language preferences on multilingual websites

__cf_bm.description: Used to distinguish between humans and bots to maintain website security

__hstc.description: Tracks visitors to help analyze website performance and conversions

hubspotutk.description: Keeps track of a visitor’s identity for analytics and form submissions

YSC.description: Tracks user interactions with embedded YouTube videos

VISITOR_INFO1_LIVE.purpose: YouTube bandwidth and behavior tracking cookie
VISITOR_INFO1_LIVE.description: Measures bandwidth and stores user preferences for embedded YouTube videos

personalization_id.description: Used by Twitter to collect data on user behavior and preferences for personalized content

_uetsid.description: Tracks user behavior across websites for Bing Ads performance analysis

_uetvid.description: Used to track visitors over multiple sessions for ad targeting and performance optimization

cookie_consent.description: Remembers whether a user has accepted or declined cookie usage

_clck.description: Persists Clarity User ID and preferences across sessions

_clsk.description: Connects multiple page views by a user into a single Clarity session record

_hjTLDTest.description: Determines the most generic cookie path to use for Hotjar

__Secure-ENID.description: Used to secure user data and authenticate requests to Google services
